channel.title: Need an experianced player to answer a few questions!
channel.description:
[glow=black,2,300]ryte ok i need the following questions answered:
1) Why will moparscape not allow me to join ccertain servers? it just says "error connecting to server. must be down"
2) Ive made my own server on no-ip.com, i have added the server name but when i try to add it to the server lists it says its offline and cant be added.
3) y are certain areas of the game unaccessable? e.g. sewers
4) y are there no monsters????????????[/glow][br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 07:12:49 AM[/size][hr]cmon[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 07:20:11 AM[/size][hr]also how do u know if its hamachi server?

item.title: Need an experianced player to answer a few questions!
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

  1. Because its either full or just down
  2. you have to port forward if you have a router
  3. Because you have to say if u use ladder, tele here
  4. Because you must add them 2 spawning

Read full topic
item.source: Need an experianced player to answer a few questions!
